website_summaries.verdict: A high carbon German steel blade that has enough weight to feel impressive in your hand.
pros: This strong, durable blade is available at a reasonable price
The serrations are carefully manufactured to handle delicate foods with a hard interior
Dalestrong stands behind its product, offering impressive support to all levels of chefs who are using the company's products
cons: The main concern is, at times, some have felt the knife slip a little to the left when cutting

customer_reviews.title: Best Utility Knife Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Dalstrong really outdid themselves while outclassing the other brands with this beauty. This is now my favorite utility knife. Making a sandwich with ease is just the beginning. So far I've used it for slicing bagels and spreading cream cheese on them (no simple chore for most knives), slicing onions, tomatoes, mushrooms, bell peppers, sausage and pepperoni (sounds like I'm making a pizza...haha). Suffice is to say that this knife is now the crown jewel in my Dalstrong collection.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased so far
customer_reviews.text: So far, we are very happy with this knife. Only used since Christmas, as I got it for a gift, but seems to be high quality & durable, with full tang set into nice treated wood handle & a very sharp blade. Came with a sturdy blade cover in very nice cushioned box. If it holds up to regular use well, I’m happy to buy more in a variety of sizes. Wish there was a 5”. Also- got email from company (via Amazon) asking about our satisfaction. Very thoughtful & a rarety these days.
customer_reviews.author: Paul & family

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy and dull
customer_reviews.text: The knife is large and heavy, too ungainly for a sandwich knife, unless one makes foot-long sandwiches for a large, hungry crowd. There is just no need for all that heft. It is like a serrated cleaver. Speaking of, it is dull, barely sawing through pealed tomatoes. Doubt I'll keep it. Better to spend $44 on a well engineered German knife, than this allegedly "German steel" hatchet. The supplied sheath fits very loosely, provides no safety at all. The only good thing, handle looks pretty, at least brand new.
customer_reviews.author: D.L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Hefty and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The sandwich knife I’d had for probably 30 years finally started coming apart, so I ordered two on Amazon. This one was worth the price. The knife is hefty and sturdy—and very sharp. It does what it says it will do. It slices bread and sandwiches, English muffins, whatever. It also will slice a tomato or something like that, and it has that nice, rounded tip for spreading condiments. It’s by far my favorite knife right now. I want to get more from this brand, if possible.
customer_reviews.author: reesah mouse

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Incredible knife. Super sharp, fantastic packaging, the sheath is a great touch! Very, very pleased
customer_reviews.author: misa

customer_reviews.title: Best utility knife ever.
customer_reviews.text: The new favorite knife in the kitchen. Beautiful, very well balanced, awesome craftsmanship. I’m going to gift some of these knifes. Hold and use this knife, your going to be impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Simon B.

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a great knife!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the sharpest and easy to handle knife I have ever had. It was a great buy when to compared to other knifes of similar materials and size. I am more than pleased and would definitely purchase additional products, Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: msbeauxarth

customer_reviews.title: Good Knife for Home Use
customer_reviews.text: This knife is great for making sandwiches at home, great for slicing tomatoes but not great for a commercial kitchen. The serration doesn’t preform well with toasted breads and buns. I love the look and feel of the handle but had to return it due to the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Burris

customer_reviews.title: Still in the honeymoon phase, but I do like it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good utility knife. Trimming fat, making a roll cut are reasons to own this knife. It is a nice addition to my other knives. I will add, The packaging is impressive. Dalstrong includes a lapel (I am guessing) pin in the package--not useful. They also include a sheath for the blade--VERY useful.
customer_reviews.author: Ovadu

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to knife for sandwich making. All in one spread and cuts deli sandwiches like a hot knife through butter. Have purchased other Dalstrong products and am very pleased with all.
customer_reviews.author: CWW

customer_reviews.title: The BEST of the BEST
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best knife I have ever purchased and or used. I love it! Perfectly balanced, strong and cuts everything like butter. I am definitely purchasing more from this company. I am just wondering why it took me so long to find them.
customer_reviews.author: lori s.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp as hell
customer_reviews.text: Great knife but the handle (wood & steel) should be flush finish because I can feel the unevenness when holding the knife.
customer_reviews.author: NMo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice packaging and sheath
customer_reviews.text: Shipped very fast. Very nice packaging and sheath. They even included a nice logo pin and polishing cloth and a owners guide. I purchased this because I recently started working in a very small kitchen. There's not much room for a French knife a bread knife and a pairing knife on my station. Hopefully this blade will allow me to do all tasks . After I use it at work I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Karl kieff

customer_reviews.title: Great knives big bang for your money
customer_reviews.text: Just love cooking now that the right knives are in the draw,nothing like having the right tools for the job!!!!after I bought my frist one had to back and get four more my set is almost complete!!! might one or two more however for right now this will kept me going for a bit!! Dalstrong is the best knife for my money and I have looked at alot of our knives, not to say that other knife are not good it's just that I got alot more value from theses thanks Dalstrong!!
customer_reviews.author: giordano radelich

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife
customer_reviews.text: I thought the packaging was overkill, but the actual knife is FANTASTIC!!! Good weight, nice hand feel, super sharp, versatile and great looking. I have several high end knifes that cost $$$ and this knife matches them all at more than half the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Michaux

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: 3rd professional chef knife purchased for home use. I am convinced that knives such as this are among the best value of all Amazon products. If used every day they will last a lifetime and can be handed down to future generations. Packaging and quality make these superior gift items as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Oh what a feeling.
customer_reviews.text: When you buy a knife online you often have to take a chance. I took that chance with a Dalstrong knife and keep coming back for more. I love these knives for the usefulness of them and their beauty. Well done Dalstrong, keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Thoff

customer_reviews.title: Great knives
customer_reviews.text: Great knives I bought one to try it and was so surprised at how sharp they really are. They are very well balanced and seem to stay sharp longer than some of the others. I do not put them in dishwasher they are hand washed and wiped down.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Quality of this knife is great.
customer_reviews.text: Dalstrong knives are very dependable. When something needs to be cut, sliced, or chopped it can be done with no effort. The blade stays sharp not dulling after a couple of uses. Quality of this knife is great.
customer_reviews.author: k reed

customer_reviews.title: Knife Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: Really can cut just about anything and with one side serrated it can cut bread, veggies etc. extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W. O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Great knife. Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: Nice knife. Nice presentation. I just got it, so time will tell how durable and rust resistant it truly is. As for the packaging(presentation) just like my marketing professor in college told me years ago, that packaging is a very important asset to a product. And this product has just that.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite knife.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite knife I have right now. I bought my mom one for her birthday as well. I currently have five other Gladiator series knives in my cart for when I have enough money to justify buying new knives.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. No complaints, well packaged and a quality knife. Should last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Razor sharp knife
customer_reviews.text: Not a chef, or a expert on steel but I would recommend this knife to family or friends.
customer_reviews.author: AKlem

customer_reviews.title: Handle could be longer.
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp right out of the box. I'm only dinging it by one star simply because the handle is a little on the short side. Probably not the best option if you have large hands. The blade itself is a nice size at 6.5" however the handle is 4 1/8" and slender. My wife likes it because of the smaller / slender handle, but for me, it's simply too small.
customer_reviews.author: BRW CRW

customer_reviews.title: OK knife
customer_reviews.text: Knife is solid, heavy. My issue is the handle doesn’t seem to have been given a final polish Can feel all the rough edges of the metal on the handle Thought quality would have been better
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Serrated utility Knife, Gladiator Series
customer_reviews.text: This knife is top-notch quality and I'm SURE I'll be using it for a very long time. Highly recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, beautifully crafted.
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful knives. Sharp and weighted nicely I highly recommend them for any kitchen. They are packaged beautifully and much more than you would expect for a mid range knife.
customer_reviews.author: CamiMarbles

customer_reviews.title: Very handy knife at lunch or snack time.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, cuts everything you need for a sandwich, esp. easy on tomatoes. I wish it was just a bit smaller, a little bulky - but I'm not sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: ckgreenthumb

customer_reviews.title: Replaced our Wustoff with these and very happy
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and a great price for really solid stuff. Hoping these will stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of this knife is great.
customer_reviews.text: Dalstrong knives are very dependable. When something needs to be cut, sliced, or chopped it can be done with no effort. The blade stays sharp not dulling after a couple of uses. Quality of this knife is great.
customer_reviews.author: k reed

customer_reviews.title: High cost for utility knife.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to match other knives bought works well on all task.
customer_reviews.author: Benn

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy junk.
customer_reviews.text: This junk knife won't even cut a raw russet potato in half. It is useless. I hate it. Wasted money. Bad company. The knife appears to be too "fat." The blade is too broad from side to side. I guess it could handle bread!
customer_reviews.author: lisasmom

customer_reviews.title: very Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Brand of High Knifes as good as J.Heckels and Wustoff, can't go wrong, I have all three brands and have been a knife collector for many years and have the very best colletion, Dolstrong I highly reccomend them. Choose which ones you need, you'll be well satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sorrentino

customer_reviews.title: Quality and sharp
customer_reviews.text: I really like the weight and feel of this knife. It fits in my well
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent utility knife for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it...Sits in my hand really nice...
customer_reviews.author: Sue OBRIEN

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Knife
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife so much I bought a second as a gift for my son. They feel great in the hand and cut like a dream and make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Eck

customer_reviews.title: Great knife and value
customer_reviews.text: Great knife and great value. It’s a substantial knife a cuts larger vegetables real easily and well. I’ll definitely look at their other knives.
customer_reviews.author: rcc

customer_reviews.title: Very good general purpose knife
customer_reviews.text: Not quite flexible enough to serve as a boning blade but it does in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: D. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sharp knife - Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a mid-size sharp knife that could easily cut thin slices of meat as well as vegetables. This knife exceeded my expectations. It is an excellent addition to your cutlery collection and a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Brock

customer_reviews.title: Splurge on this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good knife. It is a little pricy but excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bickel

customer_reviews.title: Versatility
customer_reviews.text: Veristle knife. Use it to cut back ribs, vegetables. Great for cutting cherry toms. I’ve even used it to cut small red rose potatoes. Take care of it and should last a life time.
customer_reviews.author: peter mota

customer_reviews.title: Needed a utility & got a excellent one full tang
customer_reviews.text: replace an old knife with this Dalstrong. Needed a utility & got a excellent one full tang.
customer_reviews.author: Imre Demech

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: GOOD KNIFE VERY WHEN YOU DEALING WITH MEAT WILL RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: ASTOR

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic knives
customer_reviews.text: Amazing knives. I have upgraded my work/knuf kit with four of Gladiator knives. And will probably get all of them. I walked away from cooking for over 15 years. And feel blessed to find these.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I'll be buying more!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 6 of the Dalstrong knives so far both for personal use and gifts. Because of their quality and affordability and the company that made them, I'll definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: XLNT Utility Knife for any Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful utility knife. I love it. I cook every day, and I will be using this knife every day. I own many knives of all brands, and this one is one of the best. In my view, anyone who purchases this knife will be happy they did.
customer_reviews.author: Randall V Delling

customer_reviews.title: Great 8" knife.
customer_reviews.text: Great sharp knife!! Your tomatoes will run in fear... :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic knife! Nice thickness and sturdiness of handle
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic knife! Nice thickness and sturdiness of handle, blade sharp, overall very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome knife of highest quality, favorite in my kitchen, feels great in hand
customer_reviews.author: Kristy S.

customer_reviews.title: Best small fruit knife ever!
customer_reviews.text: When life gives you lemons and limes buy this knife! Still razor sharp after 22 months of heavy use as a bartender. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Gingrich

customer_reviews.title: 5 star Quality. 5 star Value.
customer_reviews.text: After my 1st Dalstrong purchase, I had to order more & now have 5. These knives are great & I will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would like a serrated edge on booth sides. Otherwise it is great
customer_reviews.author: christmas carol

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knifes
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, BEST KNIVES I BELIEVE EVER MADE . Doug from California
customer_reviews.author: DOUGLAS WITTMAN

customer_reviews.title: 3 thumbs up (my coworker likes it too)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this knife for cooking while camping, but I love having it on me line, and for prep, it has basically replaced my pairing knife
customer_reviews.author: Sam Costello

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase...sharp and seems to be very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Tim Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Very solid feel and cuts very well, amazing deal for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Begley

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: One of the best knife company out there nice knifes.
customer_reviews.author: enrique

customer_reviews.title: great steel! But it was not the knife I ...
customer_reviews.text: Iiked the overall feel of the knife,great steel! But it was not the knife I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Young

customer_reviews.title: Get these knives...NOW!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a sous chef at a local country club. I've always had one special chef knife and used whatever other knives the facility had. For Father's Day this year, my oldest son got me a great knife roll-bag and said I should put my knives in it; but I didn't was to put my home kitchen knives in it. This special bag deserved special knives. After an extensive online search for affordable yet fantastic professional knives, I came across the Dalstrong series. I ordered them, and THEY ARE FANTASTIC! Consistently sharp, beautifully constructed, and well balanced. These knives are THE BOMB! Any chef looking for affordable quality should look no further than Dalstrong!
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Makuch

customer_reviews.title: you can't get a better all-around knife
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't get a better all-around knife. Very sharp right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Ruyter

customer_reviews.title: 2 Thumbs UP !!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it so much that I bought a second one
customer_reviews.author: Kim Benz

customer_reviews.title: This knife is well balanced and sharp as described, ...
customer_reviews.text: This knife is well balanced and sharp as described, however when cutting through produce the blade wants to veer to the left following the blade serrations. Not an ideal blade path for a right handed user.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Utility knife? But the chef and paring knives are great!
customer_reviews.text: These knives were a gift for my husband, and he wanted to try them out for a while before reviewing. Bottom line: He really likes them overall. The chef knife, he says, is nice and heavy and well balanced, and the paring knife fits comfortably in his hand (and mine). The utility knife he's not sure about, simply because we've never had one before, so he's not quite sure what it's useful for. Don't worry: He'll figure it out. Overall, he loves the knives. I'm pretty sure I couldn't have found anything better at this price level. Thank you for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sandwich Slayer
customer_reviews.text: Just received and tried it on a sub sandwich; Just ordered a second one. Perfect for the food truck, deli, or home kitchen. Bagels,muffins, French Loaves watch out; it's coming for you!!!
customer_reviews.author: pk8

customer_reviews.title: I like everything about it except the cutting
customer_reviews.text: I have used it to make sandwiches a couple of times. It tears my bread instead of cutting it. I used my chef's knife to cut my bread the last time. Perhaps I got a really dull blade because no matter how I try, it ends up ripping the bread. Pretty disappointed. Glad it wasn't a really expensive knife, but way too costly for the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I so much wanted to like this knife
customer_reviews.text: The knife is truly beautiful with worthy heft and a sharp blade. The problem is the handle that measures less than 3.5" from the finger guard to the end. This is a full inch shorter than my current kitchen knives. I just could not get a good grip. When I was cutting with it, I was in constant fear my hand would slip. It is a shame. Otherwise, the knife was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Once again very happy with Dalstrong knives
customer_reviews.text: Quality is evident. Great value. Super sharp, and size and weight are great. This utility knife is very good for a lot... including cutting and slicing hard salami, bagels, large tomatoes, etc. The wood grips and tang were not as aligned and fitted as I had seen on my first Dalstrong, but it will smooth out with handling and wear and not a concern. Will be buying more of their Gladiator Series knives for sure. P.S. Customer service really came through with a resolution regarding the handle grip.
customer_reviews.author: RJC

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, these are some of the best knives I've ever held. Perfectly weighted and balanced. Sharp and yet has some flex. I couldn't care less that they are made in China. Lots of things are. Fine handle of dark Pakka wood and German steel with full tangs. Super nice. The price is simply amazing for the Gladiator Series. I'm building a nice collection. Try one and see for yourself. I also have the carving set which includes the fork and knife. Good stuff! My only small complaint is too much packaging....... ;)
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Did not work well for me
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers noted, this knife tore rather than cut soft breads. Since cutting breads was what I bought it for, I returned the item. Thank you Amazon for your decent return policies.
customer_reviews.author: auto enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: One of the best kitchen knives i have seen.
customer_reviews.text: This is a new find for me. I am a long time cook and have used many knives. I do not remember a USA made knife3 that I have ever had that was of this quality and design. It seems that most people think that the German knives are the best that you can get. Now we have a Made in USA set of knives that put them to the back row!
customer_reviews.author: R. Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Using this knife in your kitchen is a wonderful experience. For amateur cooks and professional chefs
customer_reviews.text: This is the utility knife of your dreams. There is almost nothing this knife can't handle. The materials are absolutely best-in-class. The design is flawless. Hold it in your hands, the balance is precise. Using this knife in your kitchen is a wonderful experience. For amateur cooks and professional chefs, Dalstrong is making knives of the highest order.
customer_reviews.author: David Perry

customer_reviews.title: The only Knife brand I use now
customer_reviews.text: I was a huge cutco fan but they are super expensive. These are a little cheaper than cutco but they are on the same level. I have three sets of them now love them I’ll never buy another brand knife
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: I'm really impress with the knife.
customer_reviews.text: The advertising was right on the money. The knife meets all my needs. I thought long and hard between an electric knife and after reading the reviews I choose the right blade for my needs. Came in a beautiful case and its the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: carol m. wells

customer_reviews.title: Really a good knife but...
customer_reviews.text: The chef I worked for recommended Dalstrong knives after buying one of the Shogun series; they're a little out of my price (and needs range), but the Gladiator series is not. Since then, I've purchased seven or eight -- they're not handy so I can't count them -- and I like all of them. However, one has to be the least favorite, and the utility knife is it. It's not that it's a bad knife -- nothing could be further from the truth. It's more that I've not found any frequent use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Dull and poorly polished
customer_reviews.text: Two of these knives were purchased. The first was poorly polished and had streaking in the blade. It was returned. The second was unacceptably dull, possibly due to the design of the bevel. It will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: R.E. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very high quality knife! Packed well. Fast delivery, very reliable supplier. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: M***M

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic knife
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this knife is absolutely amazing. I was expecting a decent replacement knife for my current set, but this is hands down many grades above. I would have expected a knife this solid to be twice the price. Easily one of the best purchases for my set, and I'll be switching to this series of knives as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Anubis Devil

customer_reviews.title: The handle is comfortable and unlike most other handles (Wusthof or Cutco) do ...
customer_reviews.text: All the Dalstrong knives that I have are very sharp. The handle is comfortable and unlike most other handles (Wusthof or Cutco) do not get slippery when the knife is wet or even soapy.
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to sharpen but they rust easily
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife because it sharpens easily when needed however, it tends to get rust spots on the sharp side and sometimes I cannot sharpen the rust spot off. I also have the paring knife and love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie C

customer_reviews.title: Not for big, thick hands
customer_reviews.text: I try to make it comfortable but the balance and length of the knife is not legit for my hands. That's my only preference, depends on your hands I guess.
customer_reviews.author: D. Legend

customer_reviews.title: A great in between sized blade
customer_reviews.text: A good little in between blade when your chef knife is too big and your paring knife is too small. I like to keep one in my bag for the odd jobs that work best with a medium sized knife.
customer_reviews.author: T. Masoner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dalstrong purchase, I also bought a3.5 inch paring knife. For the price paid I am really blown away by the overall quality of the knives and the packaging. The balance and weight are excellent, fits my hand very comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McC

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this well constructed, versatile, super sharp serrated knife. I couldn't ask for higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Natty Bumpo

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Dalstrong!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased lots of Dalstrong's knives, and this is my favorite. The size and shape make it my go-to knife for small, frequent usage.It is well-weighted and fits well in the hand. High quality!
customer_reviews.author: D. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great knife, great company
customer_reviews.text: Love the knifes, I have done a lot of research because I wanted a good set of knives that would last for years that didn't empty my bank account. I love the look and feel of these knifes. The customer service has been great as well. I emailed Dalstrong on a Saturday and 4 hours later I had a response!
customer_reviews.author: Thunderbolt

customer_reviews.title: NOT CONSISTENT WITH HYPE.
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT ADVERTISED AS ONE OF THE SHARPEST KNIVES. NOT TRUE, KNIFE FAILED THE TOMATO CUTTING TEST BADLY.
customer_reviews.author: Ray M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The best knife I've ever owned. Nice weight, easy to hold. Hard as heck to get the package open, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay M. Maddox

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this since it came - works ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since it came - works well with bread, meat, tomatoes, onions - everything. Sharpness of a big blade with agility of small knife for all sorts of tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Ogei Yar

customer_reviews.title: These knives are the best!
customer_reviews.text: They feel so good in your hand and are made perfectly! I actually bought these for my son but want to keep them all for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Popsicle

customer_reviews.title: This is a high quality knife, that will last ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality knife,that will last and last. The handle feels ,and fits in your hand well. I just can't help feeling that this knife is overkill for a sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have this solid, sharp knife in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Dee S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good song sharp knife. Don't have to worry that the blade will break.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Really sharp but seems very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great knife and very sharp. I guess we'll see over time how the wood handle holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Subfam2

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp knife
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant knife. Sharp. This is my first DALSTRONG , I plan to order a carving knife next.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good knife but heavier duty than I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger and heavier than I wanted, but seems to be a good knife so far.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta G. M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bartender's knife
customer_reviews.text: I will be buying Dalstrong knives exclusively going forward if I need to replace any of my current ones. Fit and finish had a couple of small imperfections but I cant complain given the steep price difference between Dalstrong and their European competition.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Cheschi

customer_reviews.title: This is a great knife for any collection
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife for any collection. High quality, versatile functionality. Works great cutting fruit, vegetables, or bread. Also a great spreader.
customer_reviews.author: sean lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest knife, easily slices vegetables and A serrated knife ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest knife, easily slices vegetables and A serrated knife cuts better than a regular knife. I highly recommend this knife.

customer_reviews.title: Good solid product
customer_reviews.text: My dream knife! Well worth the expense.... Heavy duty... Good solid product!

product_meta.title: DALSTRONG - Serrated Utility Knife - Gladiator Series - Forged ThyssenKrupp German HC Steel - Sheath
feature_bullets: Outstanding craftsmanship, cutting-edge technology, stunning design elements, and premium materials. Peak performance has never looked so good at this price.

Incredibly razor sharp, full-tang, imported high-carbon German steel with a hand polished edge at 14-16 degrees. Precisely tempered and stain resistant. This versatile blade is ideal for cutting fruits, vegetables, cheese, steak, loaves, crusty breads, sandwiches, sausages, tomatoes and more.

Award winning design, with satisfying heft, premium materials and quality feel. Luxury imported black pakkawood handle is triple-riveted with a grip that ensures comfort and maneuverability. Laminated and polished for a sanitary build, perfect for busy kitchens

Engineered to perfection at 56+ Rockwell hardness and hand polished to a satin finish. Carefully tapered for improved hardness, flexibility, and minimal slicing resistance. Tall blade height provides useful knuckle clearance.
See why thousands of professional chefs and home cooks love and trust the DALSTRONG DIFFERENCE. 100% SATISFACTION OR MONEY BACK GUARANTEE, try it risk free, we know you'll love it!
